product.title: All-Embracing Serum • Watermelon + Hibiscus
product.body_html:
50ml | 1.69 oz

Purpose: ​Restore and hydrate all skin types
Results: Fresh, radiant complexion

Wrap your skin in a sublime veil of hydration, while the divine aroma of orange blossoms relaxes the mind, and the infusion of Amethyst crystal helps to ward off negative energy.

Formulated to embrace all complexions, this light, penetrating formula imparts a feeling of newfound suppleness and long-lasting hydration to the skin.

PERFECT FOR:

• Dehydrated skin
• Signs of aging
• Blemish-prone skin, to counteract drying treatments
• Irritation after shaving
• Restoring glow to dull/tired skin
• Red, itchy skin
• Head-to-toe dryness

Luxurious and lightweight Watermelon Seed Oil leaves skin moisturized, but never greasy, while its concentration of Vitamins A, B, and E help reduce the appearance of the first signs of aging.

Hibiscus flowers are packed with antioxidants and mild natural acids, promoting a fresh, radiant complexion. The addition of Oatmeal makes this formula deliciously velvety and ultra-soothing.

This Serum is infused with the protective crystal energy of Amethyst, known for its ability to calm mind and body, rid negative energy and instill inner peace.

Fabulous for all skin types.

100% NATURAL • CRUELTY FREE • GMO FREE • VEGAN

[Ingredients]

Citrullus Lanatus [Watermelon] Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca [Apricot*] Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii [Shea*] Butter Extract, Salvia Hispanica [Chia] Seed Oil, Tocopherols [Vitamin E], Hippophae Rhamnoides [Sea buckthorn] Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis [Rosemary] Leaf Extract, Avena Sativa [Oatmeal*] Powder, Citrus Aurantium Amara [Neroli*] Flower Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens [Cypress] Leaf Oil, Bisabolol, Cananga Odorata [Ylang Ylang*] Flower Oil, Citrus Paradisi [Pink Grapefruit] Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia [Lavender*] Flower Oil, Backhousia Citriodora [Lemon Myrtle] Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium [Petitgrain Bigarade] Leaf/Bud Oil, Rosa Damascena [Rose*] Flower Oil, Hibiscus Rosa Sinensis [Hibiscus] Flower, Helichrysum Angustifolium [Immortelle] Flower, Calendula Officinalis [Calendula] Flower Extract *Organic Origin

[Application]

• Massage wherever skin needs hydration support
• Layer over an Odacité Treatment Mist for enhanced absorption
• Customize by mixing in 1-2 drops of your Odacité Serum Concentrate
• Pair with our Crystal Contour Gua Sha tool for a transformational facial massage
product.tags: amethyst, anti aging, crystal, embracing, energy, essential oil, flower, glow, hibiscus, hydration, oatmeal, radiance, sensitive, serum, shea, watermelon
